overview: A prostitute looking for clients interested in Dante in museums. In "Plou a Barcelona", fragile, dark triangle that make up the three protagonists (a prostitute, her pimp partner and one of its customers) whose background is particularly close, so characteristic of Raval in Barcelona, ​​between the signs of the hidden city, the globalization of consumerism and the world of high culture.
title: Plou a Barcelona
